data.text: I spent 3 nights in this hostel in a double private room. The room and the beds were comfortable, the shower perfectly in function with hot water. No bins in the room and no possibility to open the window because in the morning there are people in the opposte side. The breakfast was delicious, gluten free option as well. The position in fantastic: close to the Diagonal metro station and 5 minutes walk from la Pedrera and Casa Battlo. I strongly recommend this hostel for its ratio quality/price.
data.title: Nice hostel, position cum laude

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Letizia,
Thank you very much for your kind words! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and the central location of Casa Gracia; our team takes pride in providing a pleasant and comfortable experience for all our guests.

We look forward to having you back.
Best wishes,
Casa Gracia’s team
owner_response.author: Casa Gracia

data.text:
Headline: I stayed for a week in two different rooms. I'd stay here again but with lowered expectations and clearer room preference.

Pros:
-Great location on the edge of the Gracia neighborhood. <5 min walk to grocery store  and several restaurants. Walkable (~25-30 min) to city center, Sagrada Familia, Park Guell. ~10 min walk to Casa Battlo and train stop directly from the airport. Across street from Diagonal metro.
-Quirky older building that has been modernized while retaining interesting features like the original floors, elevator, etc.
-Full, good quality breakfast buffet included in room rate. Hot and cold options. Breakfast staff were friendly.
-Reasonably priced (though pricing varied wildly...some days the full apartment was half as expensive as a double room, so look out for that).
-Very comfortable beds. I switched rooms Monday during my 7-night stay, and both the single and double were of similar quality.
-Street-side rooms have french doors and balconies (superior twin, room 220), great for fresh air and views. This room also had a full sized shower.
-Lovely garden area
-Coin operated washer and dryer
-Luggage storage
-Dinner in restaurant was good

Cons:
-It's noisy. Lots of school groups, teams, friend cohorts as expected because of the dorm-style rooms. Doors slamming, running, etc. well after midnight. Weekends wer much worse than during the week. Noise was especially bad when in an interior room (414) that overlooked this weird internal alley (for lack of a better term) where the noise just reverberated and teens were yelling to each other, dropping things into the alley, etc.
-The interior double room is extremely small, and the bathroom is even smaller. Barely enough room to navigate as a solo traveler. Would be very tight for two people.
-The common areas aren't as advertised. (Seems they had a very good website designer and photographer.) Everything was just a bit more beat up in real life. The No Mas Te room is in the basement, which is a bit dark/creepy and hard to find down a separate elevator. De Tranquis is in the back of the restaurant and not accessible when the restaurant is closed. Biblioteca was unavailable, as it was used for group breakfast 6 of 7 days I was there.
-The staff at check in and in the restaurant weren't very friendly.
data.title: Great location and breakfast in a quirky older hotel, but expect it to be noisy and a bit more beat up than on website

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear,
Thank you very much for taking the time to share such a detailed review! Your compliments and feedback are much appreciated; we are so pleased to read that, in general, you had a lovely time with us.

On the other hand, we are sorry to hear about the few issues during your stay. Our aim is to ensure our guests have an enjoyable and comfortable stay. We will definitely take on board your valuable feedback and try to make changes accordingly. Thank you again for your kind words, we really hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future.

Kind regards,

Casa Gracia’s team
owner_response.author: Casa Gracia

data.text: Lovely atmosphere and friendly staff. Rooms were clean as were the common areas ,  really enjoyed having breakfast on the terrace and dinner downstairs one evening. Really can’t beat the location in one of the most exclusive areas of Barcelona apparently. Rooms could do with more storage and brighter lighting, but I chatted with reception and apparently they’re doing a big refurb sometime in future to upgrade the rooms. Look forward to returning one day. Shout out to Adam for showing us around!
data.title: Lovely city trip in the nicest part of Barca

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Good afternoon,
Thank you so much for your kind words and positive feedback. It was wonderful for us to have you and we are delighted to read that you've had an enjoyable stay/time at Casa Gracia. Guest satisfaction is a top priority for us.

We look forward to welcoming you again / We look forward to welcoming you back on your future visits.

Casa Gracia’s team
owner_response.author: Casa Gracia

data.text:
Great hostel if you are out all day. I was travelling in a group of friends. We had no sunlight window in the bedroom (women 4 dorm). Waking up with no sunshine and only seeing wall and window of next room, 4m away, was kinda despo. The lighting in rooms was not good.

As a hostel we expected a lively atmosphere but after 11pm the commercial area was closed… 

There was good storage at rooms with drawers that could be locked if you have your own locker. The bathroom was big. The room was never cleaned and trash not taken out. However we got new towels everyday which was good.
data.title: No sunlight in room but great hostel if you are outside all day.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Good morning,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we are glad to hear, that overall, you had a pleasant stay.

Our priority is to offer a pleasant experience to our guests by allowing them to have a comfortable stay, so we try to offer the best possible environment. We really appreciate your comments as they allow us to detect areas for improvement.

We look forward to having you back!
Casa Gracia's team
owner_response.author: Casa Gracia

data.text:
Exceptional accommodation... excellent team ... wonderful attitude... loved the food at the restaurant 
The rooms were very clean,  great view, great vibes ...
This is a clear winner amongst all ... 
Excellent value for money
data.title: Amazing experience
